mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(DISTINCT user_id),0) FROM srvy_rspns WHERE srvy_no = #{srvyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO srvy_rspns ( rspns_no , srvy_no , qitem_no , user_id , rspns_ct ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(rspns_no), 0) + 1 FROM srvy_rspns), #{srvyNo}, #{qitemNo}, #{userId}, #{rspnsCt} )
mapper.select:
SELECT optn_no ,qitem_no ,srvy_no ,optn_ct FROM srvy_optn
where qitem_no = #{qitem_no}
SELECT qitem_no ,srvy_no ,qitem_ct ,input_type FROM srvy_qitem where srvy_no = #{srvyNo}

SELECT A.srvy_no ,A.user_id ,A.co_id ,A.srvy_ttl ,A.bgng_dt ,A.end_dt ,A.srvy_stts ,A.srvy_cn ,A.reg_dt ,B.qitem_no ,B.qitem_ct ,B.input_type ,C.optn_no ,C.optn_ct
FROM srvy A
INNER JOIN SRVY_QITEM B ON B.srvy_no = A.srvy_no
INNER JOIN SRVY_OPTN C ON C.QITEM_NO = B.QITEM_NO
WHERE A.srvy_no = #{srvyNo}
SELECT SRVY_NO ,SRVY_TTL ,BGNG_DT ,END_DT ,SRVY_STTS FROM SRVY ORDER BY BGNG_DT DESC
